revision.text: {{DISPLAYTITLE:S_ResumeSound}} static void '''S_ResumeSound''' (bool ''notsfx'') ==Usage== S_ResumeSound can be used in [[ZScript]] to resume previously paused level music and, optionally, level sounds. Music is always resumed upon calling this function. ===Parameters=== *''notsfx'': If true, currently playing sounds will not be resumed. == See also == *[[A_StartSound]] *[[A_StopSound]] *[[S_StartSound]] *[[S_PauseSound]] [[Category:ZScript]] [[Category:ZScript sound functions]]
